Description:
Detects the execution of a system command via the ScreenConnect RMM service.

Author: Ali Alwashali
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Remote Access Tool - ScreenConnect Remote Command Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (parent_process_path like '%\screenconnect.clientservice.exe' and (process_path like '%\cmd.exe' and original_file_name = 'cmd.exe') and command like '%\temp\screenconnect\%')
